summary.intro: I am a Japanese-Chinese bilingual from Beijing. I'm conducting research that combines foreign language education and machine learning at Kyoto University Graduate School.
summary.business: In October 2023, I founded EastLinker Inc. and have been commissioned to develop a vocabulary profiler for the National Institute for Japanese Language and Linguistics.
summary.development: I am developing an English learning app called 'LANDS' using Swift and Node.js, and working on web development with React.
summary.research: My research includes automatic generation of multiple-choice vocabulary questions using Word2Vec and vocabulary difficulty measurement using LLMs, utilizing fine-tuning of LLM models, Gensim, Scikit-learn, and Transformers.
summary.focus: I focus on the educational applications of Large Language Models (LLMs) and have extensive experience in team development.
